citeinfo.title: Geology of Blue Mounds State Park

pubinfo.publish: Minnesota Department of Natural Resources (DNR) - Parks and Trails

descript.abstract: This dataset contains 8 layers describing the geology of Blue Mounds State Park. The work used to produce this data was published in this report: GEOLOGY OF BLUE MOUNDS STATE PARK For documentation of the indivual layers, see the metadata files associated with those layers: Structure - Bedding Structure - Peleocurrent Directions Structure - Glacial Structures Geologic Stations Geologic Features Fractures Outcrop Bedrock Geologic Units
descript.purpose: Creating a geologic map and written documents that highlight and explain features of geologic interest in Blue Mounds State Park.

citeinfo.title: Blue Mounds State Park Bedrock Geologic Units, Fractures, Geologic Features, Geologic Stations, Outcrop, Structures

theme.themekey: geology, structure, geologic feature, bedrock, outcrop, fracture, geologic station

procstep.procdesc: These features had been derived from the data collected with the Trimble Geo7Explorer unit during 6/1/2015 and 6/5/2015. The data had been postprocessed using Trimble PathFinder office software.

overview.eaover: See the individual metadata for each of the sub-layers: Blue Mounds State Park Structure - Beddings, Blue Mounds State Park Structure - Paleocurrent Directions, Blue Mounds State Park Structure - Glacial Structures
overview.eadetcit: Geology of Blue mounds State Park: Final report for Minnesota Department of Natural Resources Contract #93015 with the Minnesota Geological Survey, University of Minnesota, Twin Citeis - July 2015 by Mark Jirsa.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).
